59namespace TagLib {
60
61 class String;
62
63 // These integer types are deprecated. Do not use them.
64
65 using wchar = wchar_t; // Assumed to be sufficient to store a UTF-16 char.
66 using uchar = unsigned char;
67 using ushort = unsigned short;
68 using uint = unsigned int;
69 using ulong = unsigned long;
70 using ulonglong = unsigned long long;
71
72 // Offset or length type for I/O streams.
73 // In Win32, always 64bit. Otherwise, equivalent to off_t.
74#ifdef _WIN32
75 using offset_t = long long;
76#else
77 using offset_t = off_t;
78#endif
79
84 using wstring = std::basic_string<wchar_t>;
85} // namespace TagLib
